name.br: Pergaminho de Amplificação de Grupo (7 dias)
name.jp: パーティーポイント増幅の巻物（7日）
name.sp: Pergamino de Amplificación de Party (7 Días)
name.th: Scroll of Party Amplification (7 วัน)
name.tw: 劇團點數無限制卷軸(7天)

description.en: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 7 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.ar: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 7 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.br: Seu grupo irá receber o dobro de pontos quando elevar de nível. Duração de 7 dias. Note que o contador deste pergaminho continuará regressivo mesmo se você estiver desconectado.
description.cns: 当你的剧团升级后，你的剧团将获得两倍的剧团技能天。持续 7 天。 请注意，即使退出，此物品持续时间还会被计算。
description.de: Deine Party erhält doppelt so viele Partypunkte, wenn sie ein neues Level erreicht. Hält 7 Tage. Die Zeit läuft auch dann weiter, wenn der Charakter offline ist.
description.fi: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 7 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.fil: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 7 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.fr: Pendant la durée du parchemin, les points de groupe obtenus à chaque niveau seront doublés. La durée de ce parchemin décroîtra même si vous êtes déconnecté. Dure 7 jours.
description.id: Party Anda akan mendapatkan dua kali lipat jumlah poin saat mencapai level baru. Berlangsung selama 7 hari. Perhatikan bahwa penghitung pada item ini akan terus menghitung mundur bahkan saat keluar.
description.it: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 7 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.jp: パーティーのレベルアップ時の獲得ポイントが2倍になります。7日間有効です。（ログアウトしてもカウント）
description.kr: 극단이 새로운 레벨에 도달했을 때 두 배의 점수를 받습니다. 7일 간 지속되며, 로그아웃한 경우에도 카운트다운은 계속됩니다.
description.nl: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 7 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.pl: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 7 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.ru: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 7 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.sp: Tu Party ganará el doble de puntos cuando alcance un nuevo nivel. Dura 7 días. Ten en cuenta que el contador del objeto seguirá bajando aunque estés desconectado.
description.sw: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 7 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.th: ปาร์ตี้ของคุณจะได้รับคะแนนเป็นสองเท่าเมื่อไปถึงเลเวลใหม่ เวลา 7 วัน โปรดทราบว่าเวลาในไอเทมนี้จะยังคงนับถอยหลังแม้ว่าจะออกจากระบบแล้ว
description.tw: 劇團升級所獲得點數兩倍，持續7天，即使登出也會持續計算。
description.vi: Nhóm của bạn sẽ nhận được gấp đôi số điểm khi lên cấp độ mới. Kéo dài 7 ngày. Lưu ý rằng bộ đếm trên mặt hàng này sẽ tiếp tục đếm ngược ngay cả khi đã đăng xuất.
